commentBody: This is not news if the Navy football team figured out that the USAFA was using their prep school as a pipeline in the 1980s.     My experience as a "townie" ball boy in 1969 and 1970 (N-Star!...finally),a "Keelboat Instructor Trainer" at Santee Basin (2010 and 2012) and a grandson of '21 and son of '50  is that the Brigade of Midshipmen is a more democratic, diverse and stronger due to United States Naval Academy Preparatory School, now in Newport, Rhode Island.     If "THE" U.S.N.A drops celestial navigation or we all can reverse the course of the Pentagon's  "Joint Strike Force Fighter" airplane ....wake me up.
